summary: This mod introduces "Evaandor", a high elf warrior to Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=6]Evaandor Follower[/size][/color][/font]


[font=Times New Roman][size=5][i]This mod adds High Elf warrior "Evaandor" to Skyrim. He can be found at the Bard's College in Solitude. [/i][/size][/font]

[b][font=Times New Roman][color=#00ffff][size=5][u][i]*Ran through TES5Edit & Playtested![/i][/u][/size][/color][/font][/b]


[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=6]Features[/size][/color][/font]


[list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=5][i]Lightfoot (will not set off traps)[/i][/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=5][i]Essential (cannot be killed)[/i][/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=5][i]Marriageable [/i][/size][/font]
[/list][font=Times New Roman][color=#f1f1f1][size=4]
[/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=6]Credits [/size][/color][/font]

[font=Times New Roman][size=5][i]Big Thanks goes to [/i][/size][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=5][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311]KS Hairdo's Renewal[/url]﻿ by Kalilies & Stealthic[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=5][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22793/]Morrowind Armor Compilation[/url]﻿ by THusky[/size][/font]
[/list]
author: AedanStarfang
